content: अभ्यागमः {@--1@} Coming or going near, arrival; a visit; तपोधनाभ्यागमसंभवा मुदः <ls>Śi. 1. 23</ls>; किं वा मदभ्यागमकारणं ते <ls>R. 16. 8</ls>; <ls>Mv. 2. 22</ls>; वसंतमास° <ls>K. 308.</ls> {@--2@} Vicinity, neighbourhood. {@--3@} Arriving at or enjoying a result. {@--4@} Rising, getting up. {@--5@} Striking, killing. {@--6@} Encountering, attacking. {@--7@} War, battle. {@--8@} Enmity, hostility.
